name: Marion QUINN, Executrix of the Estate of James Russell Quinn, Deceased, Appellant, v. HOOVER & STRONG, INC., and Charles F. Damm, Inc.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Marion QUINN, Executrix of the Estate of James Russell Quinn, Deceased, Appellant, v. HOOVER & STRONG, INC., and Charles F. Damm, Inc.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
LARSEN and PAPADAKOS, JJ., dissent.

attorneys: Mark B. Aronson, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Herman Kimpel, Pittsburgh, for Hoover & Strong, Inc.
Louis B. Long, Louis B. Loughren, Meyer Darragh Buckler, Bebenek & Eck, Pittsburgh, for Charles F. Damm, Inc.
casebody.head_matter:
522 A.2d 554
Marion QUINN, Executrix of the Estate of James Russell Quinn, Deceased, Appellant, v. HOOVER & STRONG, INC., and Charles F. Damm, Inc.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 9, 1987.
Decided March 23, 1987.
Mark B. Aronson, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Herman Kimpel, Pittsburgh, for Hoover & Strong, Inc.
Louis B. Long, Louis B. Loughren, Meyer Darragh Buckler, Bebenek & Eck, Pittsburgh, for Charles F. Damm, Inc.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
